voice.name: en-US-TonyNeural
voice.prosody: Pardon, pardon, Monsieur, pardon Madame, have you not heard?

voice.name: en-US-NancyNeural
voice.prosody: We hear very little, and we understand even less.

voice.name: en-US-TonyNeural
voice.prosody: Unfortunately, along with these unhappy refugees the scum of Europe has gravitated to Casablanca. Some of them have been waiting years for a visa.
